caption.p: Effects of the polymorphism CCR5Δ32 on HIV and WNV infections. Upper panel: effects observed in individuals with the wild-type homozygous genotype (WT/WT). Bottom panel: effects observed in individuals with the homozygous genotype variant (Δ32/Δ32). This figure was created using Servier Medical Art illustrations (available at https://smart.servier.com, under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License).
